entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
